original: COLBJÖRNSEN, Bjarne J :son, Bruksdisponent, Civilingenjör, Stockviksverken, f Uppsala 21/5 95 av prof K F Johansson o Ulla Colbjörnsen, gm Rannveig Brussgaard. Studex 13, KTH (kemi) 16, spec.stud Inst of Tech- nology Cambridge Mäss USA ss komm.koll. -o Sv.Am.St stip 21—22. Driftsing Ska Ättiks-fabr 17—18, v Sthlms Superfosfat Fabr AB :s anl Gäddviken 18—29, v Ljungaverk 29—31, dir.ass o övering AB Fören Superfosfatfabr Lkrona 31—35, Hälsingborg 35—42, br.disp Stockviks-verken sed. 42. Led Hälsingborgs dräts.kamm 37—42, luftsk.nmd 38—41, v. ordf 39—41, arb- o löneavtnmd 38—42, v. ordf 41—42, ordf badhus-o badhusbyggn.ktén 38—42, v. ordf badhusstyr 42, led 40—42; sakk v tills av prof i kem tekn v KTH 43. Styr.led AB Chromgarveriet Klippan 37—38, styr.suppl AB Fören Superfosfatfabr sed. 42, Sv Superfosfatförsäljn AB sed. 35, Gbgs Fodervaru AB sed. 39, styr.led Skidfrämj Lkrona 33—35, Hbg 36—42, 2:e v. pres Hbgs Rotaryklb 38—39, l:e v pres 39—40, pres 40— 41, led Sundsvalls Rotaryklb sed. 42, styr.led Hbgs tekn frn 35—37 o 41—42, Sdsv tekn frn sed. 42, Sv Tekn.frns avd kemi o bergsvetensk sed. 41, Borgeri valfrb Hbg 37—42, ds kassa-förv 37—41, Hbgs luftsk.frn 38—42, v. ordf 39—42, led Ind.frb :s kté f ind luftsk 38—43, styr.led Industriens Luftskyddsinst sed. 44. Resor: Finl, Danm, Engl, Span, Belg, Tyskl 12, USA, Engl 21—22, Finl, Estl,’Lett! 26^ Finl 30, Tyskl 29, 33, 35, 36, 37, 38, Engl 38. Av trycket: »Om konstgödselmedel o deras fram-ställn» (29) »Svavelsyra enl blykammarmet» (i De Tekn Vetensk), »Superfosfat» (ibid), »Konstgödselmedel» (Uppfinn bok VIII), upps 0 recens i in- o utl facktidskr o dagspress. Ett 20-tal in- o utl patent. Led T. O. sed. 29, Kemistsamf sed. 15, Sv Tekn.frn sed. 16 mfl frn, sällsk o ordnar. Sv Simfrb dipl 41, Sv gif rf b :s dipl 41.
translated:
COLBJÖRNSEN, Bjarne J:son, Works manager, Civil Engineer, Stockviksverken, b Uppsala 21/5 1895 to Professor K F Johansson and Ulla Colbjörnsen, m Rannveig Brussgaard. Graduated 1913, Royal Institute of Technology (chemistry) 1916, special studies at the Institute of Technology Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA as commercial attaché and Swedish-American Foundation scholar 1921-1922. Technical manager at Ska Vinegar Factory 1917-1918, at Stockholm Superphosphate Factory AB's plant in Gäddviken 1918-1929, in Ljungaverk 1929-1931, assistant director and chief engineer of AB Fören Superphosphate Factory in Landskrona 1931-1935, Helsingborg 1935-1942, works manager at Stockviksverken since 1942. 
Member of the Helsingborg budgetary committee 1937-1942, air defense committee 1938-1941, vice chairman 1939-1941, labor and wage agreement committee 1938-1942, vice chairman 1941-1942, chairman of the baths and bath construction committee 1938-1942, vice chairman of the bath board 1942, member 1940-1942; expert adviser to professor of chemical engineering at the Royal Institute of Technology in 1943. 
Board member of AB Chromgarveriet Klippan 1937-1938, board substitute of AB Fören Superphosphate Factory since 1942, Swedish Superphosphate Sales AB since 1935, Goteborg Feeds AB since 1939, board member of Skidfrämjande in Landskrona 1933-1935, Helsingborg 1936-1942, 2nd vice president of the Helsingborg Rotary Club 1938-1939, 1st vice president 1939-1940, president 1940-1941, member of the Sundsvall Rotary Club since 1942, board member of the Helsingborg Technical Association 1935-1937 and 1941-1942, Sundsvall Technical Association since 1942, Swedish Association of Technical Sciences, chemistry and mining sciences division since 1941, Helsingborg municipal election council 1937-1942, secretary treasurer 1937-1941, Helsingborg air defense council 1938-1942, vice chairman 1939-1942, member of the Industry Association's committee for industrial air defense 1938-1943, board member of the Industrial Air Defense Institute since 1944. 
Travels: Finland, Denmark, England, Spain, Belgium, Germany 1912, USA, England 1921-1922, Finland, Estonia, Latvia 1926, Finland 1930, Germany 1929, 1933, 1935, 1936, 1937, 1938, England 1938. Published works: "On fertilizers and their production" (1929), "Sulfuric acid according to lead chamber method" (in The Technical Sciences), "Superphosphate" (ibid), "Fertilizers" (Invention Book VIII), papers and reviews in national and international technical journals and newspapers. Around 20 patents nationally and internationally. Member of the Technical Association since 1929, Chemical Society since 1915, Swedish Association of Technical Sciences since 1916, and several other societies and orders. Swedish Swimming Association diploma 1941, Swedish Gymnastics Association diploma 1941.
